TOCHome / Terminology / ValueSet-CARIN-BB-Adjudication-Denial-Reason

Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/ValueSet/carin-bb-adjudicationdenialreason
Version:0.1.32
Name:CARINBBAdjudicationDenialReason
Definition:

Code Lists ASC X12 assists several organizations in the maintenance and distribution of code lists external to the X12 family of standards. The lists are maintained by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS), The National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC), and committees that meet during standing X12 meetings.

Health Care Code Lists

> Claim Adjustment Reason Codes (CARC) - http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/claim-adjustment-reason-codes

> Remittance Advice Remark Codes (RARC) - http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/remittance-advice-remark-codes

Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle
  • CARIN Blue Button Explanation of Benefit Inpatient Facility Profile
  • CARIN Blue Button Explanation of Benefit Professional Non-Clinician Profile

CARIN Blue Button Adjudication Denial Reason Value Set

Code Lists ASC X12 assists several organizations in the maintenance and distribution of code lists external to the X12 family of standards. The lists are maintained by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS), The National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC), and committees that meet during standing X12 meetings.

Health Care Code Lists

> Claim Adjustment Reason Codes (CARC) - http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/claim-adjustment-reason-codes

> Remittance Advice Remark Codes (RARC) - http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/remittance-advice-remark-codes

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/claim-adjustment-reason-codes
  • Include all codes defined in http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/remittance-advice-remark-codes

Expansion

No Expansion for this valueset (not supported by Publication Tooling)
